basic.floral_language:
Tropaeolum majus 
Floriography: enthusiastic, vigorous, positive
Tropaeolum majus is an herb with emerald green, nearly round leaves with wavy edges, like lotus, the flowers are raised above the foliage, have bright colors such as orange-red or yellow, very. Flowers and leaves have a high ornamental value, potted plants can be used as decorative landscaping home environment.
Tropaeolum majus like plenty of sunny, summer afternoon sunshine and strong light scattering fits in place. June-October flowering, period flower viewing 1-2 weeks,
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-October, viewing period 1-2 weeks
basic.color: Flower color yellow, orange red, orange

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, properly shade under strong light in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, dilute fertilizers following instructions,  in early summer, spring and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
